title: FFT JSON Schema
description: JSON Schema for the FFT configuration file.

signal_length.description: The length of the signal (vector) to generate. The values inside the vector will be generated randomly.

signal_domain.description: The domain of the signal (vector) to generate.

lower_bound.description: The lower bound of the signal (vector) to generate.

upper_bound.description: The upper bound of the signal (vector) to generate.

seed.description: The optional seed to use for the generation of the signal (vector). If not provided, a random seed will be used. It can be used to reproduce the same signal (vector) multiple times.
